Key:
(So in the end, everyone just hung out in my room,
while I... cleaned the living room alone.)
Shido, there you are.
Oh. What's up, Tohka?
N-Nothing. I was worried because I didn't see you.

Oh, I was just cleaning up. I'm almost done,
so don't worry, just go back to the room.
O-Okay... I guess I will, then. But before that...
Hm? What's the matter?
I wanted to apologize...
Huh? About what?
A-About the infirmary. I failed, right?

No, don't worry about it. It was like a dream.
And I guess I was only feverish then.
Really...? But...
Anyways, Tohka... Did you figure out what love is?
No... not at all.

I figured. Arusu claimed that she was able to
gather data, but... I'm worried about whether
it was enough.

Are you sure it's not because I failed? Maybe
that's why she still doesn't know...
No... I don't think that's the case...

Honestly, even if we were successful, I'm sure she
wouldn't have gotten it.

I-Is that so?
Hmm... I do not understand.

Well, like I said, don't worry about it. Similar
things to today may happen again.
R-Right. I'll try my best not to fail next time.
Shido.
Hm? Origami, what's up?
I wanted to ask you something.
What about?

About the phenomenon that occurred after class.
She claimed, with that information, that she was
able to obtain data on how love grows.
Y-Yeah... so she claims.

What sort of data is it? I haven't
the slightest idea.
Me neither.
I see...

I was too busy being focused on my role
at the time...

Likewise. I didn't even question that I was
a student who was always in the infirmary.

Well, since we were in the middle of it all, it's
hard to tell, but maybe for someone like Arusu
who was observing, she noticed something?

That is a possibility. If it's going to happen
again, maybe we will figure it out then.
Right.
Um... Shido? Let me help you... clean.
Oh, Yoshino. Thank you so much.
N-No problem...
Oh, perfect timing.
...Huh? What is it?
How did it feel to be my older sister?
Huh...? Well, um...

Just tell me what's on your mind. I mean, it was
all like a dream anyways.
Well... um...
You were happy to be able to talk to Shido-kun\na lot, right?
Y-Yoshinon...!

Oh, that's great. I wonder if that was what Arusu
wanted to see...
I... don't know...

Oh, sorry, I didn't mean for you to have to answer
that. It was really nice having you as an older
sister.
...! Well... um... that makes me... very happy.

Another event like today's may happen in the
future. If it does, let's get through it together,
okay?
...O-Okay. Thank... you.
Oh, were you cleaning? Would you like me to help?
Kurumi cleaning, huh...? It's hard to imagine...

My, how rude. I can do all the basic chores such
as cooking and laundry.

Well, if Kurumin is using you as a base, that
makes sense.

It would be nice if an opportunity arose where I
could show you.
Yeah, that might be fun.
Hehe. Then I look forward to showing you.
That... seems like it might be wrong.
I'm going to put this cup here, okay?
Sure, that's fine.
Anyways, Shido. You'd better be thinking.
What are you talking about?

Arusu, of course. What else would I be
talking about?

Oh... Sorry, judging from what Arusu was saying,
if we repeat what we did today, maybe
eventually...

We can't always be on the receiving end of her
whims. And besides, how's she going to know what
love is by repeating what we did today?
Yeah... You were a magical girl, after all...

Seriously... Why did Arusu set up a scenario like
that... That has nothing to do with love...

Maybe it was like, love and courage and whatnot...
That type of thing might have potential?

It's a bug, is what it is. When we get back to the
real world, I'm going to cram the one responsible
for this in a magical girl get-up of their own.
Hahaha...

(I don't know who's behind all this, but I'm going
to pray for their safety...)
Verification. May I put the cups here?
Sure. Thanks.
Hehe. Today was truly entertaining.

I thought the reason we gathered was not to play,
though.

I know that. We gathered to figure out how to lift
our curse in this world, right?

Questionable. Do you think there will be
continuing situations where Kaguya and
Yuzuru are Shido's sisters?

Arusu said something like that. But I would assume
the next time would be a different situation.

Hmph. Whatever it is, it's no match for us Yamai
sisters.

Correction. Kaguya said earlier that she was
extremely embarrassed.

Because... I mean, I can't help it! I-I... we were
in bed... with Sh-Shido...

Yeah, I don't think I've ever been that nervous
before... Well, I guess don't let it bother
you...?

Offense. Are you suggesting that you don't care
about us?

N-No... That's not what I said. I mean, when we're
in that sort of state, it's different than usual.

...Agreed. If you put it that way, I guess you're
right...
...Well, yeah.
Darling, do you want some help cleaning?
Oh... Uh, it's fine. I'm almost done.

Aww, how unfortunate～ I wanted to keep acting like
your fiancée.
I-I see... Well, that's too bad.
I mean, I still want to be your fiancée!

I don't know. I'm sure Arusu's planning more
things, but it probably won't be the same
situation.

(Or rather, I hope it's not. I feel like if that
continues, I'm not going to last.)

I see. Then next time, I want to be in a wedding
dress～
That's not what we're doing this for!

I know～ But you might as well have fun with it,
you know?
You have a point. Miku, you're always so positive.

Of course～ I am an idol on a mission to brighten
everyone's day～
Right.
Oh, is the girls' night over?

Yeah. It's getting late, so we're calling it
a night.

Then let's see everyone off to the door. But it is
pretty late. Everyone okay?

I figured it's best to stay near each other while
we're in this world, so I'm having them stay in
the Spirit Mansion. That's what we talked about.
I see. That's a good idea.

(Everyone at the Spirit Mansion, huh... That's
unexpected.)
Oh, I forgot to tell you.
What is it?

While you were out, we got really pumped looking
for houses, so your room got a bit messy.
Can you seriously not?!

It's your fault that you walked out.
You asked for it.
Fine...
(Seems like I have more work to do... *sigh*)
